about.description:
django-modelcluster extends Django foreign key relations. It
introduces a new type of relation, ParentalKey, where the
related models are stored locally to the parent model until
the parent is explicitly saved.
about.summary: Django extension to allow working with clusters of models as a single unit, independently of the database

about.description:
django-modelcluster extends Django foreign key relations. It
introduces a new type of relation, ParentalKey, where the
related models are stored locally to the parent model until
the parent is explicitly saved.
about.summary: Django extension to allow working with clusters of models as a single unit, independently of the database

name: django-modelcluster
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "django-modelcluster" %}
{% set version = "6.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/django-modelcluster-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0102d00e6b884721ba21e32edb716548e0dead7880e130aa2e04854bd384a42f

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - pytz >=2022.4
    - django >=3.2

test:
  imports:
    - modelcluster
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/wagtail/django-modelcluster
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Django extension to allow working with clusters of models as a single unit, independently of the database
  description: |
    django-modelcluster extends Django foreign key relations. It
    introduces a new type of relation, ParentalKey, where the
    related models are stored locally to the parent model until
    the parent is explicitly saved.
  doc_url: https://github.com/wagtail/django-modelcluster
  dev_url: https://github.com/wagtail/django-modelcluster

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - darynwhite
    - cshaley
    - sannykr
